title: Scissors
occurrences: My wallet's gone, the keys to the apartment, and the scissors.
Big Scissors for cutting cloth. I stabbed him with them in the right arm.
- Because I felt the scissors at my face. - Why didn't you call a policeman?
Angie, no, Put down the scissors. Don't kill me, Angie!
Yes. Two days ago with a pair of scissors. I used to watch you come here for months.
and was murdered by Angie's mother with the pairs of scissors.
We've still the scissors to locate.
Ann, Help me, Find the scissors.
